author: Gamers Nexus
description:
SUPPORT THE AI DYSTOPIA REPORT SERIES: https://store.gamersnexus.net/ai-dystopia
Memory prices have skyrocketed over the last several months. RAM price increases are for a number of reasons, including AI server demand chewing through supply, previous oversupply leading to a draw-down in manufacturing (which has now caught-up), and probably also RAM companies being a-holes. We'll explore why RAM prices have gone up, the impact to NAND (Flash Memory, or non-volatile memory), the impending impact to GPU VRAM prices, and how there's nothing any of us can do -- but we can at least collect price data and make decisions on purchasing.

Watch our "WTF is Going On" video about the circular AI economy: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3JfOxx6Hh4

Learn about the special backer tiers with bonus videos and digital content: https://store.gamersnexus.net/ai-dystopia
Or grab our new "RETRO I/O" Coaster Packs! https://store.gamersnexus.net/products/gn-drink-retro-io-coaster-pack-4-custom-3d-coasters-
title: RAM: WTF?
